verses.verse: So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I am a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> today; <S%H3117><s%> I am no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to come <S%H3318><s%> and go, <S%H935><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'You shall not cross <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>'

"It is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who will cross <S%H5674><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you; He will destroy <S%H8045><s%> these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them. Joshua <S%H3091><s%> is the one who will cross <S%H5674><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> to them just <S%H9201><s%> as He did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and Og, <S%H5747><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and to their land, <S%H776><s%> when <S%H834><s%> He destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them.

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them up before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them according to all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

"Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> or tremble <S%H6206><s%> at them, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is the one who goes <S%H1980><s%> with you. He will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you or forsake <S%H5800><s%> you."

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> for you shall go <S%H935><s%> with this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers to give <S%H1><s%> them, and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> it to them as an inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the one who goes <S%H1980><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you; He will be with you. He will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you or forsake <S%H5800><s%> you. Do not fear, <S%H3372><s%> or be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "At the end <S%H7093><s%> of [every] seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> at the time <S%H4150><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> of remission <S%H8059><s%> of debts, at the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Booths, <S%H5521><s%>

when all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> at the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He will choose, <S%H977><s%> you shall read <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their hearing. <S%H241><s%>

"Assemble <S%H6950><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> and the women <S%H802><s%> and children <S%H2945><s%> and the alien <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is in your town, <S%H8179><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that they may hear <S%H8085><s%> and learn <S%H3925><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and be careful <S%H8104><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> law. <S%H8451><s%>

"And their children, <S%H1121><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have not known, <S%H3045><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> and learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as long <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> as you live <S%H2416><s%> on the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are about to cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess. <S%H3423><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the time <S%H3117><s%> for you to die <S%H4191><s%> is near; <S%H7126><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and present <S%H3320><s%> yourselves at the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> that I may commission <S%H6680><s%> him." So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves at the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent. <S%H168><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are about to lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> with your fathers; and this <S%H1><s%> people <S%H2088><s%> will arise <S%H5971><s%> and play <S%H6965><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with the strange <S%H2181><s%> gods <S%H5236><s%> of the land, <S%H430><s%> into the midst <S%H776><s%> of which <S%H7130><s%> they are going, <S%H834><s%> and will forsake <S%H935><s%> Me and break <S%H5800><s%> My covenant <S%H6565><s%> which <S%H1285><s%> I have made <S%H834><s%> with them.

"Then My anger <S%H639><s%> will be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and I will forsake <S%H5800><s%> them and hide <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and they shall be consumed, <S%H398><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H9567><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> shall come <S%H4672><s%> upon them; so that they will say <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> 'Is it not because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3588><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> us that these <S%H428><s%> evils <S%H9567><s%> have come <S%H4672><s%> upon us?'

"But I will surely <S%H5641><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H9567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they will do, <S%H6213><s%> for they will turn <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, write <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> for yourselves, and teach <S%H3925><s%> it to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> it on their lips, <S%H6310><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> for Me against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"For when I bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H127><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, and they have eaten <S%H1><s%> and are satisfied <S%H398><s%> and become <S%H7646><s%> prosperous, <S%H1878><s%> then they will turn <S%H1878><s%> to other <S%H6437><s%> gods <S%H312><s%> and serve <S%H430><s%> them, and spurn <S%H5647><s%> Me and break <S%H5006><s%> My covenant. <S%H6565><s%>

"Then it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H3588><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H9567><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> have come <S%H4672><s%> upon them, that this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> will testify <S%H6030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them as a witness <S%H5707><s%> (for it shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> from the lips <S%H6310><s%> of their descendants <S%H2233><s%>); for I know <S%H3045><s%> their intent <S%H3336><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they are developing <S%H6213><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore. <S%H7650><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and taught <S%H3925><s%> it to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then He commissioned <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> for you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to them, and I will be with you."

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> writing <S%H3789><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were complete, <S%H8552><s%>
that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> and place <S%H7760><s%> it beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that it may remain <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> as a witness <S%H5707><s%> against you.

"For I know <S%H3045><s%> your rebellion <S%H4805><s%> and your stubbornness <S%H7186><s%>; <S%H6203><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> while I am still <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> with you today, <S%H3117><s%> you have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> more, <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> then, after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%>?

"Assemble <S%H6950><s%> to me all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in their hearing <S%H241><s%> and call <S%H5749><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against them.

"For I know <S%H3045><s%> that after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> you will act <S%H7843><s%> corruptly <S%H7843><s%> and turn <S%H5493><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; and evil <S%H9567><s%> will befall <S%H7122><s%> you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for you will do <S%H6213><s%> that which <S%H7451><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> provoking <S%H3707><s%> Him to anger <S%H3707><s%> with the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> song, <S%H9598><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were complete: <S%H8552><s%>
